OpenCloser: Main OpenCloser¶

This module run the OpenCloser app

main_opencloser.main()¶

This function allow the user to start the web service OpenCloser app in a specific host and port assigned to the OpenCloser app

OpenCloser: Class OpenCloser¶

This module contains the class OpenCloser

class opencloser.OpenCloser¶

This class is for OpenCloser, the in charge of close the blockchain blocks and response to the class blockchain across the coordinator

static hashBlock(block)¶

This function generate the hash (sha256) for the block and return it :param block: the block to close :type block: Object :returns: the hash of the block using the function sha256 :rtype: hash

OpenCloser: Service OpenCloser¶

This module contains the web service function for OpenCloser

service_opencloser.closer_block()¶

The web service of OpenCloser hashed the block for blockchain and allows to close it url: http://127.0.0.1:5003/closer_block

service_opencloser.run_service_opencloser(host: str, port: int)¶

This function allows to run the service OpenCloser
